channel.title: consulting on Gantry
channel.description: Recent content in consulting on Gantry

item.title: Day Zero
item.description: Day Zero: Your team has decided that it is time to move virtual. There are questions whose answers only create more questions. What platform? Which Software? Who will handle it? What if it breaks? And most critical: What if we lose critical data? Start at the beginning and follow the map.

item.title: Decisions
item.description: Decision Making How do you decide what cloud is for you? Do you need compliance? Perhaps you are leaning towards Azure. Are your engineers on google? GCloud! Maybe you need your own control planes altogether!
